software.name: front_accounting
software.description: Web based FrontAccounting is a simple, but powerful, system for the entire ERP chain and covers:
software.custom_install_script:
#!/bin/bash
mkdir -p /home/fs/company_data/app/tmp/
chmod g+w /home/fs/company_data/app/tmp/
mkdir -p /home/fs/company_data/tmp/errors.log
touch  /home/fs/company_data/tmp/errors.log
chmod g+w /home/fs/company_data/tmp/errors.log
software.custom_post_install_script:
#!/bin/bash

rm -rf /home/app/install/

/home/engines/scripts/make_persistant_ro.sh config_db.php config.php 
/home/engines/scripts/make_persistant.sh lang themes
chmod g+w /home/fs/company_data/app/tmp/
touch  /home/fs/company_data/tmp/errors.log
chmod g+w /home/fs/company_data/tmp/errors.log 	
chmod g+w /home/app/company_data/tmp/errors.log

/home/engines/scripts/revoke_rw_access.sh /home/app
software.installation_report_template:
goto _Engines_Builder(http_protocol)://_Engines_Builder(fqdn)/
Click Continue
Fill out Database Server Settings as follows
Server Host: _Engines_Environment(dbhost)
Database Password: _Engines_Environment(dbpasswd)
Database User: _Engines_Environment(dbname)
Use '0_' Table Prefix: yes
select Install Additional Language Packs from FA Repository: and
Install Additional COAs from FA Repository: as required

Follow the wizard if installing with additional languages or COA's 
Complete the Company Settings to suit you, mantain a copy of the login credentials for Front Accounting as these are not stored by Engines.
